definition: rampant/very popular
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: What? It sounds funny. Mischievous distortion is on its way.
sentences.chinese: 什么？很有意思啊。现在，恶搞是大行其道啊。

sentences.english: Sea lampreys leave a swath of destruction as the invasive species chomps through the Great Lakes.
sentences.chinese: 七鳃鳗留下一条致命的伤口，其在五大湖大行其道。

sentences.english: With the recession, the offshoring of jobs only seems to have gained steam.
sentences.chinese: 似乎只有离岸外包在伴随着经济衰退大行其道。

sentences.english: Why did chattel slavery take hold in the Americas?
sentences.chinese: 为什么奴役制度在美洲能大行其道？

sentences.english: So how did they go from being something Japanese to something served in Chinese restaurants?
sentences.chinese: 那么，日式幸运饼又是如何在中餐馆大行其道的呢？

sentences.english: Why does He allow crime and terrorism?
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为和恐怖主义大行其道？
但凭天意，真教大行其道，和平。

sentences.english: Service-oriented systems are currently all the rage, and rightfully so.
sentences.chinese: 面向服务的系统目前大行其道，并且的确理应如此。

definition: to be in vogue/to be prevalent
to rise/to spring up/to burgeon/to be aroused/to come into vogue
tempest/wave (of popular sentiment etc)/craze or fad
to be popular for a while/to be all the rage for a time
in the middle of the road/to be in the way/to hold power/(fig.) to predominate/to be in vogue
to emerge to meet a historic destiny (idiom)/to arise at an opportune time/able to take advantage of an opportunity/to rise to the occasion
more and more emerge/innumerable succession/breeding like flies (idiom)
flourishing and still in the ascendant (idiom); rapidly expanding/still growing strong/on the up
main stream (of a river)/fig. the essential point/main viewpoint of a matter/mainstream (culture etc)
fashionable for a while (idiom); all the rage
at present/right now
(of a contagious disease etc) to spread/to propagate/(of a style of clothing, song etc) popular/fashionable
to blossom everywhere/to spring up all over the place/to flourish on a large scale
fashionable/popular
(literary) to decline/to wane/title of a section in the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1]
age/era/epoch/period (in one's life)/CL:個|个[ge4]
Time, US weekly news magazine
